4.title: Horschel, Kisner, & Perez
4.plot: Feherty travels to Naples Florida for funny conversation about life and golf with PGA Tour stalwarts Billy Horschel, Kevin Kisner, and Pat Perez.

6.title: Rafa Cabrera Bello & Sergio Garcia
6.plot: Feherty travels to New Orleans for a conversational fiesta with the 2 matadors of Spanish golf, Rafa Cabrera Bello, and 2017 Masters Champion, Sergio Garcia.

11.plot: Feherty travels to Arizona to meet friends who both excel on grass and love golf. The PGA TOUR's super Spaniard, Jon Rahm, and Arizona Cardinal's All-Pro wide receiver, Larry Fitzgerald, take us on a conversational journey inspired by a drive for excellence.

1.title: Lee Trevino
1.plot: Feherty premieres his new series from Dallas, TX with a funny and revealing conversation with one of his life heroes, Lee Trevino.

2.title: Cheadle
2.plot: Don Cheadle talks to Feherty about the joys and challenges of acting, golf, and parenthood, and gives Feherty a chance at an "Audition."

4.title: Charles Barkley
4.plot: No subject is off limits when former NBA great Charles Barkley joins Feherty for a thoughtful and thought-provoking conversation about sports, golf, and race in America.

5.title: Johnny Miller

6.title: Rory McIlroy
6.plot: Feherty begins his summer swing with 4-time major champion, Rory McIlroy, the day after the Ulsterman's emotional win at the 2016 Irish Open. Rory thoughtfully shares about the thrill of winning under pressure, the historic return of golf to the Olympic Games, and his special place as a member of golf's new Big Three.

7.title: Ian Poulter
7.plot: David Feherty visits Ryder Cup legend Ian Poulter at his home outside of Milton Keynes for humorous and insightful conversation. They discuss everything from Ian's humble beginnings in the game to his sometimes less than humble persona on and off the course. Topics include everything from Ian's love-hate relationship with social media, the recent resurgence in his play, and his storied Ryder Cup history including memories from the Miracle at Medinah.

8.title: Best of Feherty
8.plot: Lifelong friends Brad Faxon and Billy Andrade sit down on the sofa to discuss their lives and careers. From Top of the Rock at Missouri's Big Cedar Lodge, Feherty discusses topics including Brad and Billy's extensive charitable works, Brad's legendary putting, and their beloved home state of Rhode Island.

1.plot: Feherty travels to Spain to meet and play with international golfer, Sergio Garcia.

3.title: Bill Russell
3.plot: Feherty meets NBA Hall of Famer Bill Russell in Seattle, Washington and discovers that Russell is so much more than an iconic basketball player.

8.title: Gary McCord
8.plot: Its crazy X 2 when Feherty spends a funny hour with his friend and broadcast partner, Gary McCord.

9.title: Samuel L Jackson
9.plot: Feherty meets actor Samuel L Jackson in the Big Easy for a great conversation about golf, acting, civil rights and addiction.

13.title: Donald Trump
13.plot: Feherty travels to New York City to visit with Donald Trump where the two discuss such topics as Trump's father and childhood, his love of golf and course design, and the fact that he almost enrolled at film school instead of going into real estate.

14.title: Chubby Chandler
14.plot: Feherty goes international when he welcomes European sports agent, Chubby Chandler.

15.title: My Independence Day
15.plot: In celebration of America's birthday Feherty travels to the Patriot in Tulsa, OK in interview participants in the 2012 Patriot Cup Tournament.

17.plot:

18.title: Peter Alliss
18.plot: Feherty sits down with Ryder Cup legend and long-time announcer Peter Oosterhuis for a candid conversation that covers his career on and off the course and his current battle with Alzheimer's Disease. In addition to their discussion in Charlotte, David travels to Houston and visits the Nantz National Alzheimer's Center to find out the latest on the disease that is also affected his family.

19.title: John Daly
19.plot: Feherty travels to Arkansas to explore the inexplicable life and career of PGA Tour player, John Daly.

1.title: Feherty Live Hard Rock
1.plot: Feherty welcomes golf's elite to the Universal Hard Rock in Orlando, FL for an evening of laughs and music.

2.title: Jack Nicklaus
2.plot: Feherty kicks off season 3 of his critically acclaimed Golf Channel series from West Palm Beach, FL with 18-time major winner, Jack Nicklaus.

3.title: Lee Westwood
3.plot: Feherty travels to West Palm Beach, FL for a ride on the wild side with iconic British golf star, Lee Westwood.

4.title: Jack Welch
4.plot: Former GE CEO Jack Welch gives Feherty the business in this revealing and entertaining hour of the Golf Channel series.

7.title: Billy Casper
7.plot: Feherty travels to Salt Lake City, UT for a very personal visit with former U.S. Open Champion, Billy Casper.

8.title: Sir Nick Faldo
8.plot: Feherty meets iconic Alabama football coach Nick Saban in the wilds of Northern Georgia for a day of relaxation and quirky conversation about football, golf and the process that's made Saban the college gridiron's biggest winner and highest paid coach.

9.title: Curtis Strange
9.plot: Feherty finds himself the wilds of North Carolina for a back to nature visit with 2-time U.S. Open Champion, Curtis Strange.

11.title: Stacy Lewis
11.plot: Feherty returns to Arkansas (his favorite state) to explore the life and career of LPGA star, Stacy Lewis.

12.title: Tom Lehman
12.plot: Feherty takes a bumpy, thoughtful, and funny ride through the desert with PGA Tour pro, Tom Lehman.

13.title: Ben Crenshaw
13.plot: Feherty travels to Austin, TX to work on his Texas drawl with 2-time Masters Champion, Ben Crenshaw.

14.title: Raymond Floyd
14.plot: Feherty travels to Vermont for a revealing interview with 4-time major winner, Raymond Floyd.

17.title: Larry David
17.plot: Feherty travels to Los Angeles to track down comedy genius, Larry David, for an entertaining and insightful conversation about life and golf.

1.title: Behind the Scenes
1.plot: Feherty sets up season 4 of his critically acclaimed Golf Channel series with this behind the scenes look at Feherty Live.

2.title: Feherty Live Universal
2.plot: Feherty lights up Universal Orlando when he welcomes Lee Trevino, coach Lou Holtz and Irish major winner Graeme McDowell.

3.title: Feherty Live Universal
3.plot: Feherty lights up Universal Orlando as he welcomes golf icon Greg Norman, best selling author James Patterson and Olympic hockey hero, Mike Eruzione.

4.title: Charlie Rose
4.plot: Feherty, a fine interviewer himself, travels to Long Island, NY to trade questions and answers with televisions finest interviewer, Charlie Rose.

5.title: Larry David Redux
5.plot: Feherty brings back Larry David to announce the season 4 premiere of his critically acclaimed interview series on Golf Channel.

6.title: Tom Weiskopf
6.plot: Feherty travels to Scotsdale to interview major winner and premiere golf course designer, Tom Weiskopf.

7.title: Padraig Harrington
7.plot: Feherty travels to Ireland to interview three-time Major winner, Padraig Harrington.

8.title: Matt Kuchar
8.plot: Feherty welcomes PGA pro, Matt Kuchar for engaging conversation and bad tennis.

9.title: Sam Torrance
9.plot: Feherty travels to London to interview Ryder Cup hero and his best friend, Sam Torrance.

10.title: Lou Holtz
10.plot: Feherty talks golf and the gridiron with legendary Notre Dame football coach, Lou Holtz.

11.title: Tom Weiskopf
11.plot: Feherty travels to Scotsdale to interview major winner and premiere golf course designer, Tom Weiskopf.

12.title: Zach Johnson
12.plot: Feherty travels to Sea Island, Georgia for BBQ, a workout, and a ocean side conversation with 2-time major winner, Zach Johnson.

13.title: Padraig Harrington
13.plot: Feherty travels to Ireland to interview three-time Major winner, Padraig Harrington.

16.title: Sam Torrance
16.plot: Feherty travels to London to interview his best friend and Ryder Cup hero, Sam Torrance.

17.title: Lou Holtz
17.plot: Feherty talks golf and the gridiron with legendary Notre Dame football coach, Lou Holtz.

19.title: Doc Rivers
19.plot: Feherty flies west to Los Angeles for engaging conversation about basketball, golf, and life in LaLa Land with Los Angeles Clippers coach, Doc Rivers.

1.title: Al Michaels
1.plot: This week Feherty travels to Los Angeles for a fascinating conversation with super-star sportscaster Al Michaels. From the Super Bowl to the 1980 "Miracle on Ice," Al shares the details and challenges of calling his favorite games as well as his unique partnerships with John Madden and Howard Cosell. Don't miss Feherty's dubiously helpful golf tips and Al's strategies for making big money in the stock market.

7.title: John Boehner
7.plot: Feherty traveled to Ohio and Washington D.C. to talk life, politics, and golf with the Speaker of the House, John Boehner.

9.title: Nick Saban
9.plot: Feherty meets iconic Alabama football coach Nick Saban in the wilds of Northern Georgia for a day of relaxation and quirky conversation about football, golf and the process that's made Saban the college gridiron's biggest winner and highest paid coach.

7.title: Paula Creamer
7.plot: On America's birthday, Feherty does girl-talk at home and on the range with 10-time LPGA winner, Paula Creamer. The Pink Panther talks about South Korean dominance of women's golf, her passion for Solheim Cup competition and the rejuvenation of her game following a coaching change. Away from the golf course, Paula's super-sonic ride with the U.S. Navy Blue Angels will leave you begging for mercy.

9.title: Donald J. Trump Candidate
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Bob Costas
11.plot: Fresh from the Olympic closing ceremonies in Rio de Janeiro, Feherty sits down with iconic sports announcer Bob Costas. As always, Costas is encyclopedically brilliant, but with Feherty we see NBC's 19-time Emmy winner relaxed and personally revealing on subjects ranging from his father's addiction to gambling, the allure of golf, and the scourge of political correctness.

12.title: Bob Uecker
12.plot: Feherty travels to Phoenix, Arizona, for an hour of laughs and warm reflection with "Mr. Baseball," Bob Uecker. Bob's self-deprecating style keeps Feherty on the edge of his seat in a conversation that explores Bob's iconic 61-year career in baseball, entertainment, and broadcasting.

13.title: Emmitt Smith
13.plot: At home in Dallas, Feherty enjoys a Hall of Fame sit down with former Dallas Cowboy great, Emmitt Smith. Engaging conversation ranges from Emmitt's love of the Cowboys and his devotion to teammates, to his life-long fascination with business and his deep commitment to family and charity. When we add golf and even ballroom dancing its clear that Emmitt Smith is truly a man for all seasons.

14.title: Paul McGinley
14.plot: The men from Ireland get together when 2014 Ryder Cup Captain Paul McGinley sits down with Feherty far an enjoyable interview between old friends. They discuss their roots, McGinley's indirect route to professional golf, and memorable Ryder Cup moments and strategies.

15.title: Cris Carter
15.plot: Feherty sits down with NFL Hall of Famer and broadcaster Cris Carter for a candid and revealing conversation about golf, life, family and football. Along with laughter and tears, Cris engages in some good-natured putting green gloating that you'll never forget.

16.title: Terry Bradshaw
16.plot: Feherty meets NFL Hall of Famer Terry Bradshaw in Oklahoma horse country for an hour of eye-popping horsing around that includes unique memories of playing with Arnold Palmer and Ben Hogan, a critique of Matthew McConaughey, Terry's career with the Steelers, and the embarrassments he endured on his journey to becoming an elite broadcaster.

4.title: Condoleezza Rice
4.plot: Feherty sits down with former United States Secretary of State Condoleeza Rice to hear her stories about her time in the Bush Administration, music, and her passion for golf.

8.title: Hale Irwin
8.plot: Feherty travels to the Big Island of Hawaii with 3-time U.S. Open champion and Ryder Cup hero, Hale Irwin, for a big Aloha conversation about golf and life. Their visit together includes a spectacular aerial tour of an active volcano and towering waterfalls.

9.title: Stephen Curry
9.plot: Feherty explores whether NBA MVP Stephen Curry has what it takes to play on the PGA TOUR. There can be little doubt that Curry is the greatest shooter in NBA history, a tenacious competitor, and as revealed in this special conversation, one of the most engaging characters in all of sport.

10.title: Feherty 100th Show
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Matt Lauer
11.plot: Feherty gets up extra early and travels to Long Island, New York, for a day of winning conversation about life and golf with Today Show anchor Matt Lauer. Topics include a rebuke of fake news, Halloween costumes, and even nose hair trimming.

12.title: Jackie Burke, Jr.
12.plot: Feherty travels to Houston, Texas, to meet 2-time major champion Jackie Burke, Jr. At 94-years-old, Mr. Burke gives Feherty the lay of the land and even a lesson at Champions Golf Club. Topics include his time in the Marines, how an offering in the collection plate transferred into a green jacket and playing with stars like Snead, Crosby, and Hope.

14.title: Darius Rucker
14.plot: Feherty drops into Music City for an engaging and quirky conversation about fame, family, and golf with country music super-star and former Hootie and the Blowfish front man Darius Rucker. David also tees up for a day on the golf course with Darius and friends, gets a crash course in songwriting, and goes behind the scenes at a charity concert.

imdb.title: Feherty
plot: David _Feherty_ (qv) hosts a golf-themed show, which includes in-depth discussions of his guests personal lives.
